quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Pictures and Motion
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, batmobiles. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The actor who played the Scarecrow in 2005s Batman Begins originally auditioned for what part?

options.text: A Person from the League of Darkness

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Batman

questions.question: Is it true that in the movie High School Musical, Sharpay says she has acted in 17 school productions?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: The first attempts at showing motion using still pictures can be traced to this time period.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Paleolithic era

questions.question: Which two actors have played the Batman villain, Two-Face?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tommy Lee Jones, Aaron Eckhart

questions.question: How much did the first two Batmobiles from Batman Returns sell for?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: $550,000

questions.question: It can be defined as a disc with different pictures at opposite ends of viewing area. The pictures are attached by string. When the string is pulled, the two pictures appear to combine into a single image.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thaumatrope

questions.question: In High School Musical, Jason asks how Mr. Darbus  vacation went.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Leonardo Da Vinci made a series of still pictures that showed motion, when flipped.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The concept of spinning animation, the drawing of still pictures on an object that show motion when the object is revolved, dates back to at least this  many years ago.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 5,000 years

questions.question: How many times does Heath Ledger ask the question, Did I ever tell you how I got these scars? in The Dark Knight?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3

questions.question: Which of these Batman movies has raked in the least cash during its theatrical run?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Batman and Robin

questions.question: Even the Batmobile gets hit by drunk drivers.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Nowadays most animated movies are made using CGI. What does CGI stand  for?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Computer Generated Imagery

questions.question: The lines Wildcats everywhere, raise your hands up in the air are from the song Were All in This Together.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What villain did Michael Keaton face in his first Batman movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Joker

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Eragon and Country
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, title, cartoon. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The first full length animated movie was made and released in this country.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Argentina

questions.question: Which word refers to the frames used to make animated movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: cels

questions.question: Who/what is the title character in the 2006 movie Eragon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Boy

questions.question: Why is Tom Hankss character, Sam Baldwin, a lonely father in the 1993 romantic comedy Sleepless in Seattle?

options.text: His wife left him because he cheated on her.
He never had a wife, he adopted his son.
He asked his wife for some time out.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He is a widower.

questions.question: Do Robin of Loxley and Maid Marian get married at the end of Robin Hood: Men in Tights?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Daniel Radcliffe was offered the lead role in Eragon.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: 1931 saw the release of the first animated full length film with sound. In which country was it made?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Argentina

questions.question: Which of these female singers appeared in the 2006 film Eragon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joss Stone

questions.question: What is the title of the oldest existing full length animated movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Adventures of Prince Achmed

questions.question: In 1935, a full length cartoon version of Gullivers Travels was made. What was unusual about it?

options.text: It uses much of the exact dialog from Swifts novel.
It told the story from a Communist point of view.
It is told as a flashback.
It combines animation and human actors.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It told the story from a Communist point of view.

questions.question: What was the first full length animated movie made by Disney?

options.text: Academy Award Review of Walt Disney Cartoons
Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Academy Award Review of Walt Disney Cartoons

questions.question: Which Academy Award-winning actress voiced the dragon in the film Eragon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rachel Weisz

questions.question: Without a Trace, a ful length animated film about a German ship sinking a ship of another nation, was released in 1918. In which country was the film made?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Argentina

questions.question: Which of these actors was not considered for the part of Brom the warrior in the movie Eragon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sean Connery

questions.question: What type of creature is Durza, the powerful evil entity in Eragon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Shade

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Comedy
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What actress portrayed Bonnie Parker in the 1967 crime movie Bonnie and Clyde?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Faye Dunaway

questions.question: What type of criminal does Tom Powers become in the 1931 crime movie The Public Enemy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bootlegger

questions.question: What actress portrayed Sally in the 1989 romantic comedy movie When Harry Met Sally...?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Meg Ryan

questions.question: What Charlie Chaplin film was ranked the best romantic comedy movie of all time by the American Film Institute in 2008?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: City Lights

questions.question: What weapon does Judy Hollidays character, Doris Attinger, use to wound her adulterous husband in the 1949 romantic comedy Adams Rib?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gun

questions.question: Who is the director of the 1994 crime movie Pulp Fiction?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Quentin Tarantino

questions.question: In what way does Harold fake his death in the 1971 romantic comedy movie Harold and Maude?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What aristocratic title does Audrey Hepburns character have in the 1953 romantic comedy Roman Holiday?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A princess

questions.question: What famous Hollywood actor portrayed drug lord Tony Montana in the 1983 crime drama movie Scarface?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Al Pacino

questions.question: Where does Chers character, Loretta Castorini, work in the 1987 romantic comedy Moonstruck?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In a funeral parlor

questions.question: What Katharine Hepburn movie was ranked number 5 in the American Film Institutes top 10 list of the greatest romantic movies of all time?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Philadelphia Story

questions.question: What celebrated film director worked on the 1977 romantic comedy movie Annie Hall?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Woody Allen

questions.question: What record did the 1934 romantic comedy movie It Happened One Night set?

options.text: It was the most expensive movie up to that moment.
It became the highest-grossing movie of all time.
It became the first movie to win all five major Academy Awards.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It became the first movie to win all five major Academy Awards.

questions.question: What are the popular final words of gangster Rico in the 1930 crime movie Little Caesar?

options.text: Mother of mercy, is this the end of Rico?
Holy cow, is that a gun youre holding right there?
For Christs sake, shoot me like a man!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mother of mercy, is this the end of Rico?

questions.question: The 1932 movie Scarface: The Shame of the Nation was based on the life of this notorious gangster.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Al Capone

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Hoosiers
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, hackmans. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In what year was the movie Hoosiers released?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1986

questions.question: Why was Gene Hackmans character, Coach Norman Dale, suspended from coaching NCAA basketball?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Assaulting one of his players

questions.question: What does the team in Hoosiers call the play where two players line up shoulder to shoulder, setting a big pick for the shooter?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Picket fence

questions.question: Which actor played Richard, the rich American whose wife is shot in the 2006 movie Babel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brad Pitt

questions.question: In the film Hoosiers, Myra Fleener does not want Jimmy to play basketball.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the 2006 movie Babel, which actress plays Richard’s wife Susan?

questions.question: What actor portrayed young Vito Corleone in the 1974 movie masterpiece The Godfather Part II?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert De Niro

questions.question: In which country is Richard’s wife Susan shot in the 2006 movie Babel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Morocco

questions.question: In the film Hoosiers, the best basketball player in town hasnt played since his old coach died. He steps up for Coach Dale, saves Coach Dales job, and joins the team. What is his name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jimmy Chitwood

questions.question: How many times does Hoosiers character Coach Dale tell his players they must pass before shooting?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 4

questions.question: Angelo Pizzo wrote Hoosiers, and David Anspaugh directed it. What other movie that is based on a true story did Pizzo co-produce and Anspaugh direct?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Martin Scorsese

questions.question: How does Cody Jarrett die in the 1949 crime movie White Heat?

options.text: His mother stabs him to death.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He kills himself.

questions.question: What was not part of Coach Dales practices in the movie Hoosiers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shooting

questions.question: How does Vito Corleone die in the 1972 gangster movie The Godfather?

options.text: He dies of a heart attack.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He dies of a heart attack.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Babel
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, schindler. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Zorro from the 1940 movie The Mark of Zorro was listed as one of the best movie heroes in history by the American Film Institute. What does Zorros name mean in Spanish?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fox

questions.question: What are the names of the two people who practice shooting in a scene of the film Babel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yuseff and Mohammed

questions.question: Dakota Fanning plays Richards daughter in the 2006 film Babel.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which actress was nominated for a SAG Award for her part in the 2006 drama Babel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Adriana Barraza

questions.question: What correctly describes the character of Chieko in the 2006 movie Babel?

options.text: She is the typical Tokyo teenager.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She is deaf and mute.

questions.question: What is the name of Charlie Chaplins most popular film character, who was voted one of the greatest movie heroes by the American Film Institute?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Tramp

questions.question: In the movie Babel, how does the American State Department react to the accident in which Susan is shot?

options.text: They immediately respond it was part of a terrorist plot.
They send a helicopter to bring her to San Jose, Guatemala.
They send several Chinook helicopters to bring her to Cairo.
They send an American ambulance to bring her to Cairo.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They immediately respond it was part of a terrorist plot.

questions.question: The action in the 2006 movie Babel takes place in four countries. Which of these countries is not featured in the movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Egypt

questions.question: In the 2006 movie Babel, what happened to Chiekos mother?

options.text: She died of cancer at age 37.
She was killed by her husband.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She jumped off her balcony.

questions.question: What celebrated movie director created the character Indiana Jones, voted the second greatest movie hero by the American Film Institute?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Lucas

questions.question: In the 2006 drama Babel, when the nanny tells Richard that she can not take care of the children because she must go to her sons wedding, what does Richard say?

options.text: He says he would triple her pay if she watches the kids.
He threatens to turn her over to the INS if she refuses to watch the children.
He says he would pay for a better wedding on another day.
He says he would send Susans sister to watch the kids after 5 PM on Sunday.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He says he would pay for a better wedding on another day.

questions.question: What is the name of the nanny who must take care of the two children of Richard and Susan in the movie Babel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Amelia

questions.question: What actor portrayed 	Oskar Schindler in Steven Spielbergs 1993 drama movie Schindlers List?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Liam Neeson

questions.question: How does the poor Moroccan goat herder get the rifle in the movie Babel?

options.text: The tourists from Guatemala give it to him.
He buys it for 500 dirhams and a goat.
The tourists from Japan give it to him.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He buys it for 500 dirhams and a goat.

questions.question: What is the full name of Rocky, portrayed by Sylvester Stallone in the Rocky movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Balboa, Sr.
